message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about $112.50?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $109?
I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. That's the best I can do.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to meet you at $109. That's the lowest I can go.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you at $108.50. Can you reconsider?
I'm not going to go any lower than $108.75. That's my final offer.
